A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is\, objectively\, an awesome movie. The chemistry between the characters is off the charts and the action kept me on the edge of the seat. Also\, the porgs and crystal foxes were cute AF. Excellent acting particularly from Adam\, Daisy and Mark. \nI have a strong feeling that most very low reviews are due to people not getting what they wanted (male heroes and a holy legend Luke). I feel for them\, but that doesn't make this a bad movie. Go and see for yourself
